snippet.textDisplay: This is the only NES castlevania I have finished. Flame whip made it so awesome. I was never able to get all of the items like the gold dagger and such, but I don't think it was as hard as people make it out to be. I died way more in the first and third ones, and super castlevania 4 was way hard.
snippet.textOriginal: This is the only NES castlevania I have finished. Flame whip made it so awesome. I was never able to get all of the items like the gold dagger and such, but I don't think it was as hard as people make it out to be. I died way more in the first and third ones, and super castlevania 4 was way hard.

snippet.textDisplay:
My point was to say that the fanboys would demolish me because they feel the need to not allow change or to allow people to have a different opinion.

I posted a similar comment on a DoS track video and it had a -7 rating because I said I didn't like it so much.

snippet.textDisplay: My screen says your comment was written 3 minutes ago and there are no negative ratings. Just thought you should know.

snippet.textDisplay:
I was wondering how long it would be until I saw this game on this list, and while I do see its appeal, one has to admit this song has been beaten into the ground and back.

While it has the nostalgia factor, Castlevania music is so much better in modern era. It's an okay song, but there's definitely better ones to choose.

I'm sure this will get a -6 rating in about 3 minutes.
snippet.textOriginal:

While it has the nostalgia factor, Castlevania music is so much better in modern era. It's an okay song, but there's definitely better ones to choose.

I'm sure this will get a -6 rating in about 3 minutes.
